name: EnergyGridIQ
overview:
EnergyGridIQ (EIQ) helps people find and fund energy projects. EIQ displays projects on a map interface and uses geo-coded databases to suggest incentives, rebates and credits that are available for ongoing projects. EIQ’s platform gives service providers, retailers, governments, agencies and private financiers enhanced visibility and analytics on projects, motivating them to offer surgical resources and deals to make projects more attractive; thereby substantially reducing costs and increasing returns for commercial energy managers and residential homeowners.

EIQ’s goal is to capture all of the world’s energy thoughts irrespective of their size or scope using geo-data. Project developers and users anywhere in the world can create and showcase an energy project or an idea that might turn into a project for home, office or the entire community. The project could be to light a home, light a village, put solar on a commercial building, setup a wind turbine on a farm, buy an appliance or something as simple as replace an old refrigerator.
